title: Earth Science HiSET.S.2.1 (Q24)
prompt: A scientist is studying the fossils in a cliff face, shown in the diagram. The diagram shows four varieties of plant fossils distributed through layers A through D of rock. Which is the best question for the scientist to research based on the fossil distribution?
feedback: The best research question is “What environmental changes caused the changes in plant life over time?” The diagram shows changes in the species present in layers of soil that were deposited at different times. Over time, the species present in the area changed. Investigating the cause of those changes is a relevant research question. The other questions ask information about the data in the diagram. They’re not good questions for future research based on the diagram.
